Status_Game - Enum in game
That enumeration lists the game status that will be used in the controller switch to get around the different stages of the game.
Status_Menu - Enum in menu
Lists the different Menu stages: 1- game selection 2- mode selection 3- game initiation It gets feeds from the GameList and the ModeList
switchMenu() - Method in class Controller
loops the menu until it gets a valid game and a valid mode
